sid.description: The unique identifier of the message media.

account_sid.description: The unique identifier of the account associated with this message media.

parent_sid.description: The unique identifier of the parent message associated with this media.

content_type.description: The MIME type of the media content.

date_created.description: The date and time when the message media was created.

date_updated.description: The date and time when the message media was last updated.

uri.description: The URI that can be used to access this message media resource.
